ch0303_00_poppy/0101_0701_01_10: Hi, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="mister" F="miss" ]! I’ve been waiting for you!
ch0303_00_poppy/0101_0701_02_10: My friends have been ready to go, too!
ch0303_00_poppy/7101_0701_01_10:
There are so many tough Pokémon on Pasio I
never knew about!
ch0303_00_poppy/7101_0701_02_10:
I wanna become friends with them—and their
Trainers, too!
ch0303_00_poppy/7102_0701_01_10: Oh? Are you curious about my sun visor?
ch0303_00_poppy/7102_0701_02_10:
The sun is your skin’s enemy—that’s why I
wear it!
ch0303_00_poppy/7102_0701_03_10: I take care of my skin like a grownup!
ch0303_00_poppy/7103_0701_01_10:
Weak attacks won’t do anything to my Pokémon!
Nothin’ at all!
ch0303_00_poppy/7103_0701_02_10: My Pokémon train their bodies AND their minds!
ch0303_00_poppy/7104_0701_01_10: I met a Trainer with steel-hard muscles earlier!
ch0303_00_poppy/7104_0701_02_10: I hope I can look like that someday...
ch0303_00_poppy/7105_0701_01_10:
I wanna have a serious Pokémon battle with you
someday, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="mister" F="miss" ]!
ch0303_00_poppy/7105_0701_02_10:
But watch out—I’m one of the Elite Four, so it
won’t be easy!
ch0303_00_poppy/7105_0701_03_10:
Make sure you do some solid training so you don’t
get crushed, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="mister" F="miss" ]!
ch0303_00_poppy/1701_0702_01_10: I’ll give you another one if you behave!
ch0303_00_poppy/2501_0701_01_10: In Paldea, it’s my turn to battle after Rika loses!
ch0303_00_poppy/2501_0701_02_10:
Any Trainer who can beat Rika must be
reeeally strong...
ch0303_00_poppy/2501_0702_01_10:
When I can’t take revenge on Rika, they send in
the grandpa squad!
ch0303_00_poppy/2511_0701_01_10:
I don’t get lonely on Pasio ’cause Rika and my
Pokémon are here.
ch0303_00_poppy/2511_0701_02_10:
I’ve also made some new friends, so I’ve been
having more fun!
ch0303_00_poppy/2511_0702_01_10: You’re one of my precious friends too, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="mister" F="miss" ], so...
ch0303_00_poppy/2511_0702_03_10: I-I hope we can continue to be good friends!
ch0303_00_poppy/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! I always wake up earlier than
everyone else!
ch0303_00_poppy/3003_0701_01_10:
I just ate my lunch, so I’m full of energy! Now it’s
time to get some solid wins!
ch0303_00_poppy/3005_0701_01_10: Mmmph... Mmmrrhmm. It’s almost my bedtime...
